actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide waiver authority for the requirement to provide a written justification for the exact grounds for the denial of a visa, except in cases of intent to immigrate.
short_title: Law Enforcement and Intelligence Sources Protection Act of 1995

summary.text: Law Enforcement and Intelligence Sources Protection Act of 1995 - Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide waiver authority for written notice of visa denial requirements, except in cases of intent to immigrate.

titles.title: Law Enforcement and Intelligence Sources Protection Act of 1995

A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide waiver authority for the requirement to provide a written justification for the exact grounds for the denial of a visa, except in cases of intent to immigrate.
